The World's First Minecraft Earth Strategy Server

Strategy. Survival. Stakes.

Revolutionize Minecraft Strategy

Earth.Net represents the future of Minecraft multiplayer gaming. We've created a revolutionary Earth-scale server where every decision matters and every action has real consequences.

Earth-Scale Map: Explore and conquer territories spanning the entire globe
Strategic Gameplay: Form alliances, wage wars, and build empires
High-Stakes Economy: Trade, gamble, and compete in our token-based system
Family-Friendly Zones: Safe play areas with parental controls

"Where Minecraft Meets Global Strategy"

Revolutionary Features

Experience Minecraft like never before with our cutting-edge features designed for strategic gameplay and immersive experiences.

Live Earth Map

Navigate and conquer real-world geography in our immersive Earth-scale Minecraft world

18+

Casino-Style Games

High-stakes gambling zones with token-based economy and strategic risk management

Child-Safe Play Zones

Protected areas with parental controls, moderated chat, and family-friendly content

Faction Wars & Strategy

Form alliances, declare wars, and engage in large-scale strategic battles

Token Trading & Economy

Dynamic marketplace with player-driven economy and investment opportunities

Cosmetic Upgrades & Skins

Customize your character with exclusive skins, effects, and visual enhancements

Community Events

Regular tournaments, challenges, and community-driven content creation

Achievement System

Unlock rewards and climb leaderboards with our comprehensive achievement framework

Real-Time Updates

Live server events, instant notifications, and dynamic world changes

Advanced Security

Military-grade encryption, anti-cheat systems, and comprehensive moderation

Ready to Conquer Earth?

Important Information

Essential details for joining and playing on Earth.Net

Account Registration & Support

Make sure to register as an account if you're joining to play our server.

Support Options

  • • Email our lovely support at: helpearthnetmc@gmail.com
  • • Create a ticket in the Earth.Net Discord server
  • • Talk to one of our lovely support operators

Country Creation Limits

Standard Limits

People creating a country are limited to two people:

  • • One for the person creating
  • • One for a friend

Rank/Subscription Benefits

If you have a rank or subscription, you can increase that slot to 4 people.

Alternative Option

If all countries are taken, register as a rebel.

Account Verification & Registration

Complete your registration and verification process to join Earth.Net. This form helps us ensure all players meet our age requirements and understand our server rules.

Open Form in New Tab
